Title.evidence: Randomised Controlled Trial of Robotic-Assisted vs. Conventional THA

Trial_Design.evidence: This matched-pair controlled study included 100 patients undergoing THA

Intervention.evidence: The intervention group (n=50) received robotic-assisted THA, while the control group (n=50) underwent conventional THA.

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was the proportion of cups positioned within the safe zones of Lewinnek et al. and Callanan et al., assessed radiographically.

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: Randomisation and allocation concealment methods were not specified.

Number_Randomised.evidence: This matched-pair controlled study included 100 patients undergoing THA

Number_Analysed.evidence: The intervention group (n=50) received robotic-assisted THA, while the control group (n=50) underwent conventional THA.

Result_Outcome.evidence: Odds ratios for cups outside the safe zones were zero and 0.142, respectively (95% CI, 0.044, 0.457).

Trial_Registration.evidence: Trial registration and funding details were not provided.

Funding.evidence: Trial registration and funding details were not provided.
